document.title: Hot Topic: The 1994 MTAS Salary and Fringe Benefit Survey
document.abstract: The MTAS annual salary and fringe benefit survey for 1994 is complete and shows salary increases for city employees grew at a rate higher than 1993, continuing a trend.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#11
